content: CHICAGO  March 3 Best Buy Co Inc  the largest U.S. consumer electronics chain  said on Tuesday it will launch a new cost savings program in fiscal year 2016  beginning Feb. 1.
name: Best Buy Co Inc
title: Best Buy aims to save $400 mln over 3 yrs

content: NEW YORK  March 3 U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Tuesday  after the Dow and S&P marched to new record highs and the Nasdaq topped the 5 000 mark for the first time in 15 years.
name: Best Buy Co Inc
title: US STOCKS-Futures dip after Dow  S&P records and Nasdaq 5 000

content: March 3 Best Buy Co Inc  the largest U.S. consumer electronics chain  reported a 2 percent rise in quarterly same-store sales  helped by higher sales of large-screen televisions and mobile phones in the holiday shopping season.
name: Best Buy Co Inc
title: Best Buy same-store sales up 2 pct

content: Best Buy Co Inc   the largest U.S. consumer electronics chain  said it expects same-store sales growth to be flat to negative in the first two quarters of its fiscal year  citing low demand for computers and tablets. | Video
